resources.string:
Calendar

The Calendar helps you manage your schedule, appointments and dates. In AppAssist you can:

  • View your schedule for the day
  • Create new appointments
  • Go to a specific date

Add Event

Add a new event to your calendar.

Contacts

The Contacts app helps you manage your phone numbers. In AppAssist you can:

  • View your contacts list
  • Add a new contact
  • Find a contact

Add Contact

Add a new contact to your address book.

Find Contacts

Type in to search for a contact by name.

Gallery

The Gallery helps you manage your Photos. In AppAssist you can:

  • View your gallery

Clock

The Clock helps you manage your alarms and timers. In AppAssist you can:

  • Open your clock
  • Open your timers
  • Set alarms
  • Set a quick timer

Open Timers

Opens the timers on the clock app.

Alarm

Set a new alarm in your clock.

Quick Timer

Choose from a number of timers to automatically set.
